articles.author: Jim Hardy, Milo Boyd
articles.title: Hunt for missing woman in Santa suit after 'men approached her' on Christmas Day - The Mirror
articles.description: Katarzyan Pawelak - known to her friends as Kasia - has been missing since Christmas Day at around 3.30pm when she was in Plymouth, Devon and Cornwall Police have said
articles.content:
Fears are growing for a woman in a Santa outfit who's been missing since Christmas Day after claims that a group of men in a car stopped her as she was walking home.
Devon and Cornwall Police have i… [+1983 chars]

articles.title: Eyimofe makes Guardian UK's best films from Africa, Asia, Latin America list - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Eyimofe has been picked along with nine others on a shortlist of top films from Africa, Asia and Latin America by The Guardian of the UK.
articles.content:
